title: Add Logo
description: Upload your business logo to make your profile recognizable.

title: Add Interior Photos
description: Upload photos of your business interior to attract customers.

title: Add Team Photos
description: Upload photos of your team to create trust and relatability.

title: Edit Business Description
description: Update your business description to highlight your services and specialties.

title: Update Phone Number
description: Ensure your primary phone number is correct for customers to reach you.

title: Update Website URL
description: Ensure your website URL is correct and points to a relevant landing page.

title: Add Services Offered
description: List your services or products with descriptions and pricing where applicable.

title: Set Business Hours
description: Ensure your business hours are accurate, including special hours for holidays.

title: Verify Contact Details
description: Check your email, phone, and other contact info to ensure customers can reach you.
caution: Completing this task ensures your customers can reach you without any issues.

title: Request Reviews from Customers
description: Send review request links to 3-5 satisfied customers.
caution: Completing this task increases your business credibility and online visibility.

title: Thank 5-Star Reviewers
description: Send personalized messages to thank customers who left excellent reviews.
caution: Completing this task strengthens customer relationships and loyalty.

title: Respond to Recent Reviews
description: Reply to all reviews from the past 7 days to show customers you value their feedback.

title: Add Cover Photo
description: Upload a cover photo to showcase your business ambiance.

title: Add Exterior Photos
description: Upload photos of your business exterior for better visibility on Google Maps.

title: Share Special Offers
description: Post any current promotions or offers to attract customers.
caution: Posting offers helps attract more customers and increase engagement.

title: Showcase Your Team
description: Introduce your team members with photos or a post to help customers connect with the people behind your business.

title: Add Product Photos
description: Upload photos of your products or key services to attract customers.

title: Verify Location on Map
description: Ensure your business location is correctly pinned on Google Maps.

title: Add Logo Variants
description: Upload alternate versions of your logo for different placements or themes.

title: Add Staff Profiles
description: Add short bios and photos for your team members to improve customer trust.
caution: Showcasing your team builds trust and encourages engagement.

title: Add Service Photos
description: Upload photos that showcase your key services or products.

title: Add Cover Photo
description: Upload a high-quality cover photo that best represents your business. This image appears prominently in your profile and attracts customer attention.

title: Add Seasonal Offer Photos
description: Upload photos of seasonal promotions or offers to attract customers.

title: Check Business Hours Accuracy
description: Review and confirm your business hours are up-to-date, including holidays.
caution: Keeping hours accurate ensures customers can visit at the right time.

title: Add Business Video
description: Upload a short video (30–60 seconds) that showcases your services, team, or location to build trust and engagement with customers.

title: Request Customer Testimonials
description: Reach out to customers for short testimonials to display on your profile.
caution: Testimonials help build trust and attract new customers.

title: Add Location Photos
description: Upload clear photos of your business location for better map visibility.

title: Add Team Introduction Video
description: Upload a short video introducing your team to make your business more relatable.

title: Add Customer Experience Photos
description: Upload photos that showcase happy customers using your products or services.

title: Add Menu or Catalog Photos
description: Upload images of your menu or product catalog for customers to browse.

title: Add Customer FAQ Video
description: Upload a video answering common questions from customers to reduce inquiries.

title: Ask Customers for Photos
description: Request 3-5 customers to share photos of your products or services.
caution: Encourage customers to share photos to increase trust and engagement.

title: Add Business Opening Date
description: Add your business’s opening date to help customers know how long you’ve been in operation.

title: Verify Business Location Photos
description: Check and confirm your location photos are clear and accurate on Google Maps.
caution: Clear location photos help customers find your business easily.

title: Post a Customer Success Story
description: Share a short story or testimonial from a happy customer on your profile.
caution: Sharing success stories builds trust and encourages new customers.

title: Add Featured Service Photo
description: Highlight your top service or product with a featured photo.

title: Add Celebration or Event Photo
description: Upload a photo from a recent celebration, event, or achievement at your business. It helps show your active presence and builds trust with potential customers.

title: Add Promotional Banner
description: Upload a banner image for your current promotion or campaign.

title: Add Service Video
description: Upload a short video demonstrating one of your key services.

title: Highlight Customer Review
description: Feature a positive customer review on your profile to attract more customers.
caution: Highlighting reviews builds trust and encourages new customers.

title: Add Product Demo Video
description: Upload a video showing your product in action to attract customer interest.

title: Share Customer Stories
description: Post customer success stories or testimonials to showcase positive experiences and attract new clients.

title: Add Featured Product Photo
description: Upload a photo of your most popular product or service.

title: Add Team Spotlight Post
description: Feature one team member with a short post to showcase your team.
caution: Spotlighting team members increases engagement and humanizes your business.

title: Upload Before & After Photos
description: Showcase your work by uploading before and after photos of your services.

title: Add Customer Review Highlights
description: Feature a few key customer reviews on your profile to attract attention.
caution: Highlighting reviews improves credibility and customer trust.

title: Update Business Name
description: Ensure your business name is accurate and matches your signage. Consistent naming helps customers recognize your business across platforms.

title: Post About New Arrivals
description: Create a post highlighting newly launched products or services to keep your audience updated.

title: Post Behind-the-Scenes Content
description: Share a post showing your business operations or how your products/services are created.

title: Post About a Community Event
description: Share updates or participation details from local events, festivals, or sponsorships to increase visibility.

title: Post Tips or How-To Guide
description: Share helpful tips, DIY guides, or insights related to your business to establish expertise.

title: Post Holiday Greetings or Festive Wishes
description: Celebrate major holidays or festivals by posting greeting messages to engage customers and build goodwill.

title: Post Customer Testimonials
description: Share a recent customer review or testimonial to build trust and showcase positive experiences.

title: Post Limited-Time Offers
description: Create a post announcing discounts, deals, or special offers to attract new and repeat customers.

title: Post Team Introduction
description: Introduce your team members or staff to make your business feel more personal and relatable.

title: Post Customer Story
description: Share a short story featuring how your product or service helped a customer achieve something great.

title: Post Before-and-After Showcase
description: Highlight transformation or improvement with before-and-after photos to demonstrate results.

title: Verify Payment Methods
description: Confirm all accepted payment methods are listed correctly and up-to-date.
caution: Accurate payment information prevents customer confusion at checkout.

title: Confirm Parking Information
description: Verify parking availability and details for customer convenience.

title: Validate Accessibility Features
description: Confirm accessibility features like wheelchair ramps, elevators, and accessible restrooms are accurately listed.

title: Verify Health & Safety Measures
description: Confirm current health protocols, sanitation practices, and safety measures are properly communicated.

title: Check Appointment Booking System
description: Test your online booking system to ensure it's working correctly and appointments are being received.

title: Verify Delivery Areas
description: Confirm your delivery service areas and restrictions are accurately listed.

title: Validate Certification Badges
description: Confirm any professional certifications, awards, or recognition badges are current and properly displayed.

title: Check Email Response Time
description: Monitor and ensure customer emails are responded to within 24 hours.

title: Verify Social Media Consistency
description: Ensure your business information is consistent across all social media platforms.

title: Confirm Return Policy Accuracy
description: Verify your return and refund policies are clearly stated and up-to-date.

title: Validate Staff Training Updates
description: Confirm staff training and certification records are current.

title: Check Inventory Accuracy
description: Verify that online product listings match actual inventory availability.

title: Verify Emergency Contact Information
description: Confirm emergency contact details are current and accessible to staff.

title: Validate Customer Feedback System
description: Test your customer feedback collection process to ensure it's working effectively.

title: Confirm Wi-Fi Availability
description: Verify customer Wi-Fi is operational and access details are correct.

title: Verify Supplier Information
description: Confirm key supplier and vendor contact information is up-to-date.

title: Check Equipment Maintenance Logs
description: Verify maintenance schedules and records for essential business equipment.

title: Validate Insurance Documentation
description: Confirm business insurance policies are current and properly documented.

title: Verify Loyalty Program Details
description: Confirm loyalty program terms, points system, and rewards are accurately communicated.

title: Check Customer Privacy Compliance
description: Verify compliance with privacy policies and data protection regulations.

title: Take a Selfie at Your Business
description: Share a quick selfie from your workplace to show you're active and present.

title: Share Today's Special
description: Post a photo of today's special offer or featured item.

title: Capture Your Workspace
description: Take a photo of your clean, organized workspace or counter.

title: Post a Quick Tip
description: Share one helpful tip related to your industry or products.

title: Snap Your Welcome Sign
description: Take a photo of your business entrance or welcome sign.

title: Share What You're Working On
description: Post about a current project or task you're handling today.

title: Photo of Happy Customer Moment
description: Capture a genuine moment of customer satisfaction (with permission).

title: Post a Fun Fact
description: Share an interesting fact about your business or industry.

title: Capture Your Product Display
description: Take a photo of how your products are displayed to customers.

title: Share a Behind-the-Scenes Glimpse
description: Post about something interesting that happens behind the counter.

title: Photo of Your Tools or Equipment
description: Snap a picture of the tools you use to provide your services.

title: Post a Thank You Message
description: Share a simple thank you note to your customers for their support.

title: Capture Seasonal Decorations
description: Take a photo of any seasonal decorations in your business.

title: Share a Customer Compliment
description: Post about a nice thing a customer said recently.

title: Photo of Your Most Popular Item
description: Snap a picture of your best-selling product or service in action.

title: Post About Local Weather
description: Share how the current weather affects your business or services.

title: Capture Your Packaging
description: Take a photo of how you package products for customers.

title: Share a Weekend Greeting
description: Post a simple Friday or Monday message to your customers.

title: Photo of Your Business Card
description: Take a clear picture of your business card for online visibility.

title: Share What Makes You Unique
description: Post one thing that sets your business apart from competitors.

title: Add Appointment Link
description: Add your online appointment or booking link so customers can easily schedule a visit or service.
caution: Ensure the link directs to a valid and secure booking page for a smooth customer experience.

title: Add Chat Option
description: Enable customers to contact your business instantly through WhatsApp or SMS by adding a chat link.
caution: Ensure the WhatsApp link or phone number is active and correctly formatted (include country code for SMS).
